Title: How To Have a High Performance Mindset w/Dr. Bob Winters!
Description:
Dr. Winters is a high-performance coach and has helped trained many athletics to perform better in their mindset. You can catch this also on my podcast. He shares amazing tips about controlling your mindset and how to gain confidence in life and every avenue of life! 

Dr. Robert K. Winters is an internationally renowned Sports Psychologist, Author, and professional speaker.  He holds Bachelor's (B.S) and Master’s (M.A.) degrees from Ball State University and earned his Ph.D. doctorate in Sport Psychology from the University of Virginia.   His major academic areas were confidence, performance enhancement, counseling, and educational research.   Dr. Winters has spent the past 35 years investigating how one’s thoughts and attitudes affect one’s ability to perform to their optimal talent level.

Title: How To Control The Scarcity Mindset! CHANGE THIS!
Description:
The scarcity mindset is real. When we have the scarcity mindset it starts to not let us attract the things we want and it's also not attractive to people. What's important to understand that this does not mean that you can't be scared, or vulnerable at times but a scarcity mindset comes from fear, expectations, and insecurity. This is completely different. In this video, I talk about how and why this challenges relationships and how to start the habits to change this around!

Title: Why Empaths Attract Narcissist (Toxic People)
Description:
Being an empath is different from being empathetic.  Being empathetic is when your heart goes out to someone else.  Being an empath means you can actually feel another person’s happiness or sadness in your own body.
In empaths, the brain’s mirror neuron system – a specialized group of cells that are responsible for compassion- is thought to be hyperactive.  As a result, empaths can absorb other people’s energies (both positive and negative) into their own bodies. At times it may even be difficult to tell if you are feeling your own emotions or someone else’s. In this video, we talk about how to break the chain on attracting energies that take and instead be with energy that gives.

Title: 7 Signs She's Leading You On!
Description:

Title: How To Get A Girls Number Without EXPECTATIONS & Being CREEPY!
Description:
How to get a girls number! Understand there are no rules in getting a girls number. Approaching women with just a simple "hello" will help you open up the space to create a conversation with a woman. If a woman is not interested in a conversation then it's ok to walk away. It's about trying. 

Eye contact in approaching women is like a warning. Make eye contact for more than 3 seconds. Compliments do go a long way. When you want to get her phone number and know how to pick up girls you have to stop putting so much stress and pressure on yourself to do things perfectly if you've never done it before or don't do it often. 

Casual conversations about things in your surroundings are very important...

Title: Can Chemistry Be One-Sided | The TRUTH About Chemistry!
Description:
Can chemistry be one-sided? since we like someone and we feel this connection with someone, they should feel and like us themselves." We go along and we find a woman let's just say that we're dating and we have such an intense attraction for her but maybe she doesn't have the same attraction for you.

And then we get hard on ourselves and say, "What did I do wrong?" Well, first of all, if you didn't come off needy, if you're a confident man and you didn't become overbearing with her, weren't disrespectful with her and obviously you did all the right things and all of a sudden she just doesn't like you it doesn't mean that there's something wrong with you and I want to be really clear about that. Because a lot of times we reflect on ourselves when something doesn't go right in our lives just in general in a relationship and this is a healthy way of being.

But in a relationship, if a woman is not into you, take a seat back and say, "What did I do possibly that I could have done better?" Again, if this you weren't a needy man, you weren't overbearing, you weren't disrespectful, you're coming from a confident place and you feel like the chemistry is just one sided then this means that the woman is probably not there yet or will never be there for you. Because of the fact that we go through life thinking just because we like someone they in turn, and we feel something, they in turn have to like us back, which isn't the case. This is what relationships and dating are all about is finding out who this person is and as time goes on, yeah, we all get rejected. I've gotten rejected before in my life but that didn't stop me from finding love.

Description:
FREE SECRET VIDEO “ALPHA TRAITS WOMEN LOVE”:
https://www.apolloniaponti.co/the-alpha-magnet-free-training?el=youtube

Mindsets that attract women! The biggest thing women are attracted to is a man with clarity and dignity. Someone who does not want to settle for anything less. A man that wants a woman on her purpose and that will bring him up in life and the same vice versa. Alpha male mindsets mean you are not addicted or seeking validation and attached to an outcome right away. The way you look at yourself in life projects on to other people. When you put pressure on yourself to be someone else then you are coming from a place of lack instead of abundance and abundance is showing yourself and others around you that you are happy with where you are in life. This is attraction for women since this shows a sense of emotional security. What women want is for a man to also be unapologetically honest and have his own opinion. This is critical to men today since so many think the opposite. Whenever I talk to women I ask them what attracted them in the first place. They always say the way he was always honest and had a difference of opinion and was not passive.

Title: How To Turn "Friends With Benefits" Into A Relationship | 4 Tips That REALLY WORK!
Description:
How to turn friends with benefits into a relationship! This advice is for men that actually form a connection with a woman they first thought was just a "booty call". Understand that friends with benefits relationships are 50/50 and never lose sight of putting yourself first. 
Tip # 1: Get out of the pattern of what you usually do. This is how you start to turn friends with benefits into more. 
Tip# 2: Ghost her, for a little bit. You need to reconnect and change the pace of things. 
Tip # 3: Show her something different. Something different then you were doing before. Become a little more invested step by step. 
Tip #4: Scare to talk about it. In the video, I give you a perfect way to talk about it and bring it up with keeping your sense of control. 

Curiosity questions are the key to happiness and successful communication in relationships. This is the best friends with benefits advice that you will receive. I have seen so many couples become couples after FWB relationships with these tips I'm sharing with you today. 
4:54: Is a must listen to in this video. Don't leave without listening to this part!

Title: I Love You But Not In Love With You | What It REALLY Means!
Description:
I love you but I'm not in love with you. The words that take our hearts out of our chest! Right? Although this is expressing a real feeling, it can mean many things. It usually takes couples a while to figure out where and why this has happened. Is it a part of the normal cycles of love, or is it a sign of an end of the relationship? When we ask ourselves why are we falling out of love or not in love anymore its because there is an absence of another kind of feeling, and you may think the relationship won't last. Although this may prove to be the truth, it is more likely it isn’t. The underlining meaning behind this and improving or saving your relationship is getting to that feeling of absence.

Title: How To SPICE UP Your Relationship! 5 Tips To Keep It Spicy!
Description:
How to spice up your relationship! In this video I give you some tips to try to spice up your relationship and implement these things in your relationship. I have men and women constantly asing me this question and I wanted to give you some fun activities and new thins to try again. 
#1: Have a conversation with her about something you've never talked about.
#2: Do something that scares both of you. This amplifies dopamine levels in your relationship.
#3: Influence her by your goals.
#4: Date night! Commit to this. A lot of couples cancel this first. 
#5: Get out of your routine. 

Bonus tip: Have some alone time and go somewhere by yourself that both of you can miss each other.

Title: Why Infidelity | Overcoming Infidelity & Understanding Infidelity!
Description:
Infidelity. Overcoming infidelity. I want to be very clear about this. Just because I condemn infidelity does not mean I condone it. I’m here to give you some understanding around something that happens in so many of our lives. I’ve always tried to understand “why” infidelity because it affects so many people in so many ways and in this video I hope I give you some better understanding and clarity as of why. Infidelity these days has increased in so many ways because people sometimes cannot even get a grasp on what it means or why. What I mean by this is infidelity in the older times used to be your partner sleeping with someone else or possibly having an emotional affair. But now with social media, dating apps and porn we wonder if this person is cheating with these new platforms in our days today. Here’s what I’ve come to understand in my years of teaching people about healthy relationships and how to have one. Since fidelity is something we always question as we try to link it to something. Well, she was just trying to be nice. Well, she forgot to delete her dating app, well she just talked to him or her on social media, and so much more. The underlining thing here is if it’s a secret in your relationship then this is infidelity! If you have a secret then to keep a secret is an organized and structured way to do this. In order to keep a secret from your partner then you have to invoke time to provoke yourself from not getting caught. You know, I’ve seen so many people say I cheated, I don’t know why but I still love my partner. Sometimes people cheat because they are longing to re-connect with something different within themselves. This is not to condone but again this is what I’ve seen. Especially in clients that have the disease of addiction. See, sometimes it’s not about them wanting to leave the person that they are with but that they want to leave the person that they have become. Again, this is why openness and communication as relationships progress is necessary because you constantly change as the world evolves because you evolve. If you hold this in from your partner you go in search to leave the person you’ve become in order to feel a sense of re-connection with yourself or sometimes fantasy and this fantasy can last a while. That’s why it's so important to bring all of you into a relationship even when you’re evolving and not hold back. I am going to talk about 3 most common reasons that attract people to cheat. #1 is the sexual presence of desire. This does not always mean sex itself this is an energy that can be created to feel desired or to be desired by someone or something else. #2 is the emotional involvement that can be transactional meaning “we’re just friends” but yet it’s offering you something that you wish your partner would offer you. Then there is another type of emotional involvement of someone offering you that emotional piece that’s missing in your relationship. So instead of turning to the one your with. It’s easier to turn the support you already have. #3 is the disease of addiction.

Description:
Should a woman pursue a man? This video, I talk about how to get results as a woman and a man and if they should pursue and how they should pursue each other.  

Women- you have to make it clear that you are interested and show that you have a desire in him. Show him and then let him initiate. Stop sitting back and let him initiate. Men are just afraid of rejection as you are. This is a two-way street! When a woman shows that she has clear interest you make it a lot easier for a man to pursue! If the man never initiates or pursues then its time to just walk away. 

Men- pursue a woman that will initiate. If she does not, voice this and always be unapologetically honest. Never chase always court, pursue or initiate if it's being reciprocated.

" I see you looking at me like that" 
" Wearing red to catch my attention huh? It's working"

#3 Pick up the phone and call her! Make sure your text is business! But pace yourself. Do not idolize her! You are in demand. :)

Title: 5 Reasons Why Women Flake | How To Stop Attracting Flaky Women!
Description:
Why women flake! Real reasons why women flake from a woman herself. I talk about the mindset of a woman when she flakes. 

#1 Not interested in the first place: A woman may not be 100% attracted to you and she just noticed that she does not want to lead you on anymore so instead she decides to flake. 

#2 You're coming off too strong! You are making it known that you want to be with her so early on. 

#3 You weren't doing anything different. You have to be 100% sure of who you are and what you want from a woman. Stand and act from a sense of pride and respect. Not fake and arrogant. 

#4 Overly nice and excited. You agree with everything. 

#5 Be yourself!

Title: 6 Red Flags In Relationships You Should NEVER Ignore!
Description:
Reg flags in relationships you should never ignore. I know sometimes when it comes to love we always want to hope for the best but these red flags are what makes toxic relationships. You have to be honest with yourself and what you need moving forward when you are trying to cultivate a healthy relationship. Some of the signs I talk about are below. 

#1 Lies: You might find your partner saying white lies, hiding their phone, and you know that there are things she is lieing about and you have no idea why and she is not open to telling you this then it's a red flag. 

#2 Trust: When you don't have trust in a relationship there is no relationship at all. Trust comes from a place where you feel comfortable with your partner. You feel safe with them. 

#3 Manipulation: They turn things against you to make things work for them.  I share examples in this video. 

#4: Unhappiness: If you are not happy with this person then this is a big red flag. 

#5 You hide your partner from friends or family! This is a red flag in a relationship.

Title: What Is Self-Respect & How To Own It!
Description:
What is self-respect? In this video, I am going to give you the definition is and then going to break it down on how it impacts your life and relationships. Respecting yourself is the key to excellence. Respect yourself is the key to getting others to respect you. 

Urban Dictionary: https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=self-respect

It means you're proud of who you are and the man that you've become. The difference between making mistakes and moving forward is that you don't attach and you know how to gain self-respect for yourself by learning from them. 

Self Confidence and self-love is so important to when it comes to having a purpose and it should be the #1 thing in your life. You don't have to be a millionaire but you do have to respect yourself enough to be able to be aligned and motivate you and makes you happy. If you're in search for something that someone else can give you then this will fade away. 

You can't lean on drug or alcohol to solve your problems. In your pain is a lot of our problems are solved. You have to be a strong root in order to grow to a tree. The metaphor I was talking about in this video. Once you clear out those weeds and blossom into something more. You have to grow! Watch this video to understand what I mean about this metaphor.

Description:
If you have been a victium of a scam. Follow these steps. 

1.Stop talking to the scammer. 
2. Reach out to a loved one for security purpose. 
3. Put a alert on your credit and monitor your credit repot. 
4. Contact the dating site that the scame happened.

Typically these people have heavy accents and also will never do a facetime or talk to you on webcam. Please beware of this as there are many people who find love online but how to find love online is being smart online.

Title: She Wants A "Break" | 3 Thing You Must Do!
Description:
In this video, we are going to talk about, when a woman says that she needs a break.
I'm going to try to really dissect everything in this video. Because I want this to be a one-stop-shop for you. I've created other videos which I'm gonna put up here on the link above about when she says she needs space, and what "I need space" typically means. So I want you to also watch those two videos after that because my coaching practice is revolved around helping you men get the answers and really change and impact your love lives, and get that love life that you want to cultivate that healthy relationship.

So a lot of times when a woman is asking for a break, she is either asking for a break because maybe she fell out of love with you, or maybe she just doesn't truly really need love herself. So you might have heard "Oh, I need a break because I need to work on myself" or "I need space because I need to work on myself", or "You need to work on you, and I need to work on me". 

Here is what 90% of the time ends up happening when a woman says that. You beg and you plead, and you tell her "No, no, no, like, we can do this together, don't do this, don't break up with me, are we breaking up?" And then she is telling you, "No, we're just on a break, we need to take some time away from each other". Typically, maybe that will happen or maybe she'll just tell you "Yeah, we are breaking up". 

But here is the thing then. You can have full control to get this relationship back, but you have to do exactly opposite of what you're programmed to do. And what I mean by programmed to do is emotionally, we react. So first instinct is we react, and our reactions are always trying to convince that person that they're making a bad decision. 

But here is the thing when it comes to relationships, and I talk a lot about in my videos is individuality is so pure in human behaviors and in a relationship. And what we start to do when we're in relationships is we love that person, but we tend to forget that you are your own individual, and even though it's a partnership, you only have control of yourself. And that's why self-love and self-dignity and self-worth, all of that stuff that I talk about in some of my videos, I tell you that that's why it's so important that you have a 100% of this, so that you can have that healthy relationship, because when you come to a time where your girlfriend is saying that she needs space, possibly it's because the relationship had some flaws, let's just say, in it, and she is asking for you to work on you, and for her to work on herself, which is a great thing.

But here is how you take full control of this whole meaning of "I need a break", and "I need space" in order to get this relationship back if it's meant to be back. And I'm going to tell you that, and I'm going to give you tips on how to do this. What I want to emphasize here, men, is do not try to gain control of her. She is her own individual, just like you're your own individual. And you can't convince someone to be with you unless they decide that they wanna be with you. That's how they stay, that's how they stick. Convincing is only temporary. Do you understand what I mean by this now?

Title: Who Pays On The First Date | Top Questions & What Women Think!
Description:
I am going to talk about who pays on a first date and answer some questions that you viewers have around this. I am also going to give you different scenarios and I have a special message at the end so make sure you stay till the very end. Lets first chat about why a man may pay on a first date until we get to the “who should pay”. Typically a man pays for this first date because he is either that type of guy or he wants to impress you. These days a man pays for a date because this is how he was raised, or he feels guilty, and he thinks that he isn’t a man if he doesn't do so. Which I completely understand but I am going to talk about why this happens and also how to open up the conversation around this sensitive topic. I conducted two surveys not too long ago about who pays on the first date. I asked 200 men and women. I gave them the option asking if men should pay or if the woman should pay. It was shocking! Almost 80% said the man should pay. Then I conducted another survey to a new group of men and women and asked should a man pay on a first date or does it depend on the situation? Shocking! 90% said depends on the situation. I bring this up because nobody answers what the situation is? So let's talk about this today!
I am going to give you some insight on how most women think about a man paying on a first date. I am here to give you the honest truth so don’t attack the messenger. Women typically want a man to pay on the first date because they say this expresses interest and he into me. If I like him but no connection women will ask to split the bill. Women think if a guy is really interested then he will pay on the first date. 

Topic #1 Men should always pay on the first date: I know a lot of you are going to roll your eyes but the majority of women want a man to pay on a first date. This does not mean that you have to take her out to a 5-star dinner but take her somewhere you feel comfortable with on the first date. Men, I've been working with you forever. When you find a woman you are interested in the majority of you will not take her somewhere where you put no thought into it. That’s what counts. Now I know a lot of you will say women are all golddiggers, they use you for your money etc. But last time I checked women are making money and more independent more than ever these days. 
There are exceptions to this and we will talk about this as I go on in the video. 

Topic #2 She asked me out does she pay? Women are asking out men these days. When a woman asks you out most of the time she is going to be willing to pay. I believe something you can do to show interest and really impress her especially if you like her is kindly ask her if you can pay (if you can afford it) and if she still insists then you grab the drinks, tips, or dessert afterward. Also, if you choose to let her pay then I encourage you to pick up the rest for the night. 

Topic #3 She always wants to split the bill with me. Here is where you contribute some humor and fun towards this. You can hand the credit card to the server as you go to the restroom. You can pick up the drinks at the bar, or you can also plan something for the both of you and say this is my treat. Women love when a man can take control with a sense of wit and integrity. 

Topic #4 She never pays on the dates. I’m always paying Apollonia how do I get her to pay? I get it! As mentioned in the beginning of the video I totally understand why you may feel like this. It might not be that your mind paying on dates but you want to feel a sense of appreciation as well. So here is what I always recommend when this happens. Tell the girl your dating to plan something that she likes to do. You can say it like this. “ I want to see something that interests you, I want to see a part of your world. So I challenge you to take me out on a date.”

Title: Dating In The Workplace | 4 Tips To Increase Chemistry & HR Dangers!
Description:
Dating in the workplace. Did you know in 2017 23% of marriages were found in the workplace! I keep it real about dating on the job. I talk about how to be careful and why it's so important to take your time because this can cause workplace dating problems and this is where people get in trouble. I share common things about company dating policy. If you are someone who is in management or a  superior then it's important you become very careful so you don't lose your job. I do believe falling in love with a coworker isn't always a bad idea. It's so common that people find workplace love because you spend so much time together. 

What a lot of people don't talk about is to get clear on what your intentions are before going out on a date because you don't want office drama and getting HR involved. There has to be a balance between the office romance, love, and work. Falling in love in the workplace can be tricky because of the fact that it can start to interfere with work. You get more emotional and it impacts the relationship. One thing I want to be very clear about is you have to PACE yourself! This is big especially with everything that is going on in today's world. YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL AND TAKE YOUR TIME! 

This is key to relationships and also workplace love. Make sure you follow the 4 tips I give you in this video and make the smart decisions to pace yourself.

Title: My Girlfriend Flirts With Other Guys!
Description:
My girlfriend flirts with other guys. This was a requested video and I want to be very clear about this message in this video. Also, respect your relationships and if you do not see that you are being respected in your relationship then you must set boundaries for yourself and the relationship. When she flirts with other men then this is an obvious sign that things are not right. If she is a "friendly" person then it's up to you to decipher what is actually good and what is not. 

In this video, I am not saying to not let her have guy friends. What I am saying is if she constantly is flirting with this guy friend and you do not feel good about this relationship then it's time that you consider what this friendship is all about and have that talk with your girlfriend. Especially if you know the other guy's intentions are not to just be friends. It comes down to the both of you and what you want as a couple. These are boundaries and friendships that need to be talked about early on in the relationship. 

As I mention in this video if she constantly flirts with other men then she is doing this for attention which is not healthy and she has some internal work that needs to be placed in this relationship which will help her and ultimately hopefully help you have that thriving wonderful relationship. Flirting with other men shouldn't be tolerated unless you believe in an open relationship.

Title: WHY AM I STILL SINGLE | 8 TRUE LIFE TIPS!
Description:
Why am I still single. In this video, I talk to you about the # reasons on why you are still single. This video is meant for you to have that inner reflection towards yourself if this is something that you are thinking about. Here are a couple things I want you to remember. 
* it’s very ok to be single
* it’s very ok to be alone
* don’t mix up being alone, single and being depressed together
* you can be in a relationship and feel alone. This does not make you better. 
* it’s not ok to be alone and depressed about being single. There is a lot of strength in being alone. 
* it’s possible to be alone and not depressed 
* take care of your mental health to avoid any negative thoughts about being single. 
* the right relationship makes you happy and comfortable mentally

Tip #1 Focused too much on a list. Your idea of perfect is on a list and you are looking past what is in front of you. 

Tip #2: You're a workaholic. This isn't a bad thing at all! But if you want a relationship to try to give a little bit of time to that. Your purpose is everything in life. 

Tip #3: Socially awkward. If you don't put yourself out there then it time to make some moves instead of leading with fear. 

Tip #4: Don't choose partners wisely. You are attracting toxic or the same type of women. You have to take the steps to really get to know women. 

Tip #5: Limited to your access of things to do. You do not go out and do things on your own. You stay home and stick to a routine that ends up cornering you into not progressing in your life. 

Tip #6: Too stuck on having a relationship. You want a relationship so bad that women can feel your energy of coming off too eager. You can be too persistent and to focus on being in a relationship. 

Tip #7: You compare relationships to your old ones. 

Tip #8: You have a negative outlook on dating and relationships.

Title: Falling In Love With Emotionally Unavailable Women | Mini Coaching Session
Description:
Emotionally unavailable women! Falling in love with an emotionally unavailable woman is very difficult and happens so much. 60-80% of my coaching session is about this and this was a highly requested video. Because it was I also give you a mini-coaching session for you to use and ask your self some questions and also do a self-diagnosis. 

Alot of times people chase people who don't know how to love themselves. This is where the problem stems. Emotionally unavailable partners have a lot of growth to focus on. I talk about what this means in this video. If you continue to attract emotionally unavailable partners then you are attracting a mirror of things that might have happened to you in the past. It's about breaking free of these patterns and finding value in yourself to know you deserve to have what you want and not be unfulfilled. 

Emotionally unavailability is something a lot of people come across and sometimes can get confused with a woman just not being interested in them but keeping them around. Either way, you should not sacrifice yourself in these relationships. When a woman loves you she will emotionally be there for you in there way that I talk about in this video. I see so many men saying Apollonia "my girlfriend is emotionally available." So I ask why are you sacrificing yourself for someone does not value you? 

You can transition to get that valued relationship so I encourage you to watch this video and book a session.

Title: 4 Signs She Wants To Be More Than Friends.
Description:
Here are the top 4 signs to focus on. I want to be clear here. You have to observe her behaviors and it might not be all of them but see how she acts around you in regards to these 4 signs.

FREE EBOOK ] 7 COMMON MISTAKES MEN MAKE WHEN ATTRACTING A WOMAN 
https://www.apolloniaponti.co/free-e-book-7-common-mistakes-men-make?el=youtube

#1 Becomes physical and compliments you. She finds ways to touch you and she will notice new things about you. Especially if you changed your wardrobe she will compliment and be able to notice these new things. She will also give you longer eye contact than normal. 

#2 She asks a lot of questions about you. Meaning non-surface level questions about who you are as an individual. She will ask about your goals and your future. She will ask you about your values and your relationship with your family. Typically she will also talk about a relationship with you and she will want to see what you like to do in your free time and your idea of what you want in the future. When it comes to women we want to form an emotional connection with men. This is what drives our attraction sexually and mentally. So how can you make her feel? 

#3 She starts doing things for you. She starts doing little things for you to take some stress or things off your plate. So she will try to help you with things that she can contribute to just as much as you should do. She will help you with things that are goals in your life. She will be your cheerleader. This is called acts of service. 

#4 She compliments you. She will notice new things that you changed and will complement the way you are naturally when you show up in life. A woman that is an extrovert finds it easy to compliment men but a woman that is introverted will be a little less open about this. She wants you to know she's interested. 

When a woman compliments you never reject it own the compliment and say thank you. I see so many men rejecting compliments and this deflects confidence away from you. It shows slight insecurities. So when someone gives you a compliment just simply say thank you and smile. :)

Title: How To Love Yourself Again | 5 Powerful & Motivating Tips!
Description:
How to love yourself again. This video is so special to me! I've been asked for a while to do this video and I am more than happy to do this. This video is so near and dear to my heart because learning how to love yourself again is so important towards your everyday life. Love yourself so someone else can love you. The biggest thing people tend to forget is if you don't love yourself how is someone else suppose to love you? 

I give you key elements on what to do moving forward, how to love yourself and be confident, how to love yourself and be happy, how to love yourself unconditionally, and how to practice self-love. 

Remember learning how to love yourself after a breakup takes time and patience. You are supported here. If you are suffering from depression or anything know that you are not alone and I am here for you. Play this video over and over and as many times as you need it. 

Tip #1: Taking the time and be patient. Sometimes you might get discouraged because you just want to be happy but understand that work requires time so you have to have patience. 
Tip #2: Be compassionate with yourself. We are sometimes our own worse critics so understand that whatever happened to you in the past does not mean anything. These are lessons, not attachments. 
Tip #3: Be present with everyone around you and yourself. 
Tip #4: Focus on your self-development. This is the biggest way that you will be able to feel supported and motivated. Take the steps. 
Tip #5: Do something you've always wanted to do and this will bring you so much joy. You might not have any drive to do it in the beginning but as long as you push yourself it will be so well worth it!

Title: What Turns Women Off | 5 Personality Traits That Turn Women Off!
Description:
What turns women off! I give you the real deal on what turns women off! What better way of knowing the thing that turns off women than from a woman herself. 

Trait #1: Being overly confidence. Turns off, women. This is a HUGE dating turn-off. This comes off to us as if you are making up for something else. Like you are not being true to who you are. This kills attraction first hand. Being you is so important. 

Trait #2: Not sticking to your word. This is BIG. Women remember what you say and what you do. So, if the relationship is going well and you plan something and then never follow up is a deal breaker. It shows instability and is a big turn off. Balance is something that women are really attracted to. 

Trait #3: You're negative! You talk bad about other people. This is what turns girls off when you are negative towards other people or speak negatively about other people. This is things that immediately turn off women. 

Trait #4: You attach too quickly. You call and text her all day long. This is a great example of turn-offs. She sees that there is nothing left that's a mystery because you've been texting her all day. Take your time to take baby steps to get to know her. 

Trait #5: You have no desire for a relationship in general. If you are a man that is looking for a relationship then you should be open to the fact that you are looking for one. This shows a lack of security if you do not stay clear on what your goals are for the future. If you tell the woman you don't want a relationship but actually do then this can come off confusing to a woman and they will be turned off by this. Yes, it might increase attraction in the beginning but you have to come clean with what your intentions actually are so you don't end up pushing her away. A key thing that I always talk about is to make sure you showcase yourself as wanting a relationship but you are not sure if it's with her because time is so important.

Title: I Cheated On My Girlfriend! She Found Out & I Still Love Her | What Is She Thinking?
Description:
I cheated on my girlfriend and I still love her. What do I do? In this video, I give you advice on the emotions your going through and also how to try and fix this relationship. If you found yourself telling her "I cheated" or " I cheated on my wife". This experience can be incredibly hard on both of you and also on the relationships. 

Cheating is not something that can heal instantly. If your partner chooses to stay with you and you find yourself saying I cheated but I still love her, then it's time to make sure you make a change towards the reason why this happened. There is no excuse for cheating as love is a conscious decision just like cheating is too. 

So, if infidelity exsist in your relaitonshp now is the time to pace yourself and heal YOU and the relationship. A lot of people think saying sorry for years will be enough when in actuality it isnt enough, Time and actions are what will help this relationship if the woman is open to moving forward or try to give this relationship another chance. The biggest things that don't make a change in relationships is when you lose patience and focus more on the outcome then you do yourself. Remember what you go through is always a lesson and you have a decision to show up for them. Make an impactful change. and you need to work on this.

I keep cheating in my relationship then there is something personal that you need to work on. Remember, you can't fake actionable change. The more you focus on you the better this relationship can get. If you find yourself saying she cheated on me then this video can help as well. I will do some more about cheating if you comment below and let me know. There is so much shame around this so you have to forgive yourself too if you want to move past this. Of course, you want to seek validation and forgiveness from your partner but you need to have it for yourself too.

Title: 6 Subtle Signs She Likes You!
Description:
Signs she likes you! In this video, I give you signs that she likes you. But I break down the signs that she likes you. I give you 3 signs of what women do and 3 signs of what women say. How to tell if a girl likes you is by following these 6 signs. 
#1 signs a girl likes you is she will want to spend more time with you. Typically ask her to do something after the date to see if she is wanting to spend more time with you. 
#2 does she like me? If she gives you longer eye contact are physchology signs she likes you especially with a smile. 
#3 She will as you in-depth questions is how to know if she likes you. and signs she likes you body language. So the deeper the relationship gets then the deeper the questions should be. 
#4 She likes you if she talks about your future and her future with you. To see if your values are aligned. 
#5 She will want to plan a trip together. This is big in the attraction process and this is a great way to figure out how you want to be in this relationship. 
#6 She will voice that she wants your time. If you ask " is she attracted to me" the see how much she wants you to call her or reach out to her through text. This is an important sign to pay attention to because a woman will want to talk to you more if she is into you. 

Remember, not all women will be able to give you these signs so that's why it's important that you have the right conversations and take your time getting to know eachother as the signs of attraction will come to you as the relationship progresses. When you start to force relationships is when things get confusing and you run into issues and questions of why things aren't going the way you want it to. So, pacing yourself and letting the both of you give 50/50 in the relationship in the beginning. If you choose to pursue more then that's your choice but remember not to lose yourself in the process.

Title: Rebound Relationships | The GOOD & The BAD About Rebound Relationships!
Description:
Rebound relationships! The good and the bad and the honest truth about how to handle rebound relationships! This video, I talk about if you should enter a rebound relationship and why rebound relationship fails. The word "rebound" has so much negative to it because it's as though you are using another for attention which I talk about in this video. 

Rebound relationship advice comes from the experience of coaching clients that have experienced this and years of being in this practice. Rebound relationships are not always bad and I clarify the times that you will have rebound relationship success because sometimes a rebound is not all bad as some make it out to be. I do give you rebound relationship signs to pay attention to since the relationship can end up not being a good one. I give you clear concise advice on how to handle these type of rebound relationships and give you answers to "am I in a rebound relationship"? 

You might be also asking can I find love in a rebound relationship and how rebound relationship last. Well, I give you the different rebound relationship stages for you to pay close attention to so you can understand the behaviors of these types of relationships and get clarity to what it is that you truly want. 

Listen, as long as you are being open and clear with your intent from day one then this is ok. If you are not looking for something serious then it's important to tell this to the other person that you are experiencing this relationship with. Also, if your not sure and just want to take your time then this is something that needs to be spoken about so the both of you know your intentions and things can work out to the best of your ability. But if you are in a space where you are 100% confident the breakup you just experienced was for the best and your ready to move on then rebound relationships can be ok and a lot of people do find love!

Title: She Flirts With Other Men!
Description:
She flirts with other men! My true advice is to not give into these antics if you're in a relationship with her. Pay attention to her on a deeper level and then make sure this behavior will not be tolerated again. Unfortunately, this comes down to a lack of respect especially if she flirts with your friends and she flirts with other guys. If you see her flirting with other men on a date then call her out on it! Yes, call her out on it! 

SAY THIS: See what she says and just respond with " That's not cute, you won't get my attention by doing that. It's a turn off" 

Some women do flirt for attention and sometimes shes flirting for attention because she is immature and has a lack of attention in her life right now. If she's in a relationship then that's when she is getting a little to carried away in bad behavior. (which I will do a video about) 

Not all women do this but this was asked for from my viewers and I want to be very clear about this. The woman that is loyal, and mature will not do something like this. The biggest thing I always talk about is that you have to have self-respect for yourself and find a woman that has the same for herself so you can both align with the same goals that you both want. 

Don't give up on finding that woman or working on your relationship. Commit to what is right for you and call out women when they choose not to show respect but also call them out in a respectful way. Assertiveness goes a long way when it comes to relationships and dating. You have to set boundaries in order to have people show up in your life like you would like them to. If they are not willing to respect that and respect you then it's time to move on and find someone that will.

Title: How To Attract The Right Woman | 5 Tips To Attract Women!
Description:
How to attract the right woman. When you want to attract women it has to come down to these 5 tips that I am giving you!

#1 Do your research on her. When you want to know how to attract women then it's important that you are attracting the right one. You have to know her more than just what she looks like. Pay attention to the signals or the red flags that she is giving you. When you want to know how to find love then you have to get through the bad ones in order to get to the good ones as well. How to attract a woman is not by putting her on a pedestal as if she's better then you. 

#2 Growth Mindset, not a Fixed Mindset- They don't want to move from a victim mentality and they think that everyone is out to get them. It's about how your outlook is because you will attract the energy that you're getting.

#5 Be persistent in yourself and not women. The mindset that attract women is being persistent in what you want and they are going to want to see you as valuable and you will see you like value. Respect is measured on how much you respect yourself. How to be attractive is not just in the physical moments. It's more mentally than anything. So many men think that you have to be the best-looking one which is absolutely not true. How to attract girls is all about how you feel in the inside.

Title: How To Be Playful With Women | 7 Tips To Make Her Want You More!
Description:
How to be playful with women. 
Tip number one is mimic a girl. If you're on a date and you find that something she's doing cute and she's playing with her hair, maybe she's a little nervous and she's just playing with her hair and she's talking to you and she's going like this as she's talking to you because this is a nervous trait that some women may do. Maybe you can just sit there and talk to her back and go like this and make fun of her because you're mimicking her and you're calling her out on something that's pretty cute and she can laugh. She'll notice this and probably ask you, "What are you doing? Are you making fun of me?" Then you can just playfully laugh together.

Tip number two, I love this one, it's create a nickname for her. I remember all my first dates with my loved one a long time ago. We created a nickname for each other and the nickname was so horrible, I'm not even gonna say it but we created a nickname for each other on our first date and it was something that we actually formulated a bond through text message, through phone calls, and it was something like only the two of us knew and found it funny. It was like this inner bond the both of you share and it's actually cute and women are really attracted to this because of the fact that it's you have a secret password or a secret code going on, so it shows and it builds attraction.

Tip number three is challenge her. Challenge her to get uncomfortable some time. I love this one, like if you are feeling the vibe and the date is going good and you can tell she likes you and she's asking you questions and maybe you've been on a date for a couple hours already, challenge her and challenge her with something like this. You don't have to do this, there's so many other options but I always love this one, is like, just sitting across from her on a date and say, "Let's see who can break eye contact first," and then just start staring at her. It will make her laugh and it kind of gets her uncomfortable but it also shows a place of confidence. That is a really, really good one.

Tip number four is escalating on things that she says. Okay, so I'm gonna give you an example of something that was always done to me when I was dating and I was a girl that lived in Florida and I was born in California and I had a really ... I still kind of have a valley girl accent and so a lot of times guys on dates would just really make fun of my accent and say, "Well, I don't know," just always kind of mocking me and escalating things that I said. It's not like I'm saying, "Well, I don't know," like that, but they escalate it, so I might just be like, "Well, I don't know," and then he says, "Well, I don't know." I know that sounds really bad but it's like not probably the best example because that sounded not like a guy would do but you know you guys get the drift. Escalate things, meaning ... I'm gonna give you another example, like saying, "I'm not sure what I want to order. What do you want?" Then he can just escalate it and because of the fact that he thinks it's cute in the way that you're saying it and he escalates it to a higher level, a higher pitch of your voice, and is actually making fun of you. That is a good way to escalate something with a woman.

Title: How To Succeed With Women!
Description:
How to succeed with women and how to succeed with women and dating. The one thing I want to point out is what you don't do. When you do like a woman and you see that she has potential or she is someone that you want to be with or cultivate a relationship with or start to date is you can't go in 100% immediately on the first day. You have to give this woman space for her to figure out what she wants from you, meaning if you go heading or dive in the shallow end of the pool ... What I talk about in my Seven Common Mistakes e-book of what men make when attracting a woman, which I'll put in the description box below ... is you can't give your all right off the bat because this is huge when it comes to attraction.

You have to show a woman that you have something going for you in your life, meaning, what is your passion? What is your purpose? What are your goals? Who is your family? Who are your friends? Don't forget about all of that just because you see this beautiful woman and you're taken away by her charm and you want to just be with her now, now, now. It doesn't work like that because what will happen is a woman will see this: one, as a red flag, or two, that you're insecure and that you might come off needy to her. So it's a huge killer when it comes to attraction. So that's not what you do.

What you do is you take your time. How do you take your time. Well, let's just begin by saying you've met this woman online or when you're out. You get her number and you get to know her a little bit. Pick up the phone and give her a call every once in a while, but don't text her all day, all night, text her a picture of what you're wearing, text her a picture of what you're eating. I mean, where's the mystery in this? You want this woman to be intrigued by you, to have a little mystery and have the wonder of what is he doing? This is what builds attraction.

Once you do this, it's time to take her out on a date. Once you take her out on a date, or if you want to just meet up for coffee, it all depends on what you want to do, or meet up at an event together. You plan that out. Get to know her a little bit. Ask her questions. Ask her the right questions. Get to know what type of woman or girl that you're dealing with because of the fact that you want to know what she has to offer you too. This is not a one way street. It's a two way street.

Think about it like this. When you go to a job interview, and I'm not saying to interview this woman when you're on a date because that would just be awkward, but I want you to think about it like this: if you go on an interview, are you interviewing the company as well because you want to make sure you're going to be happy with this company that you're wanting to interview with and also they want to know ... And they're asking you questions because they want to know if they're going to be happy with you. If they're making the right decision.

It's a two-way process and a lot of times we tend to forget this when we're dating. It's about how can I show them that I'm going to be the best guy that they've ever had, how can I show them that I can be the best boyfriend?

Title: How To Stop Being Codependent | 7 Steps To Break Free Of Codependency!
Description:
How to stop being codependent? In this video, I give you 7 steps to break free of codependency. This happens so much when it comes to dating and relationships. This is a common thing that happens in so many coaching sessions. I know co-dependent and codependency recovery is hard to understand and attain to. But it can happen. In this video, I give you the tips you need in order to do this. You may be attached and want to know how to stop being emotionally dependent. How to stop codependency and how to not be needy can come from childhood or relationships that you've had in the past. It can trigger your doubts and self-esteem. You have to self-assess where this is coming from in your life. Taking a break from dating and relationships when you are trying to break free of dependent behavior or codependency. It's like you have to date yourself and no one else. This is what's so important. Also, finding support in what you're doing every day. You have to quench your thirst for knowledge. 

You want someone you can talk to and someone who has no attachment to you. This is how you can grow. Also, find yourself again when you date and trying to break free of this rollercoaster. Alone time is vital during this time because it's probably uncomfortable for you. Self-Care is so important in what you do every day. Establish boundaries with yourself and people that enter your life when it comes to what you're willing and not willing to tolerate is important so when your boundaries are getting crossed you know when to walk away. Step up and speak up. Communication is vital in expressing yourself wants and needs. Lastly, love yourself so much!

Title: How To Control Your Thoughts & Emotions In A Relationship or Single
Description:
how to control your thoughts and how to control your emotions in a relationship. This is so common in everyone's world because it is something we go through. How to control your mindset is by following and taking control of best practices. In this video, I give you tips on how to change it and look at it differently instead of seeing it negatively.

How to control your emotions in a relationship. Well, it comes down to doing the inner work and checking in with your thoughts when they come up. There is no magic cure for negative thoughts but negative thoughts can run your life. We are all in this world to grow and if we believe our negative thoughts then our negative thoughts are going to thrive off our unhappiness. 

How to have positive thoughts is by talking to yourself first! I know it sounds crazy but it's true. Ask yourself these questions. 

1. Is this thought even true? Is it true to who I am?
2. Is this thought holding me back? If so, how?
3. Is this thought helpful to my environment?

If you feel like you can't get past negative thoughts try to label your thoughts and name them so you can be more conscious of them. Label your thoughts with "inner mean guy". Take control of your negative thoughts and talk to them so you can see where the doubt is coming from. The more conscious and aware you are of your thoughts the more in control you feel. How do you want to shift your thoughts? 

Next, talk these thoughts out. Talk to someone that values your truth to see your true vulnerability. Those teachers are out there to help and take your time to find someone that can guide you to be the person you really want to be. Journaling is significant and powerful for men. 

Watch this video to get all my tips!

Title: Do You Have Codependent Personality Traits| 6 Questions To Ask Yourself.
Description:
Hi everyone. I am Apollonia Ponti, founder of apolloniaponti.com your dating and relationship coach and welcome to today's video. If this is your first time visiting this channel, I welcome you and thanks for viewing this video. I am your dating coach for you men to go confidently in the direction to attract that woman you desire and also build confidence in order to sustain a healthy relationship.

In today's video, I'm going to talk about co-dependent personalities and if you're asking yourself if you're co-dependent, I'm going to give you questions that you can ask yourself to find out if you are. If so, if you struggle from co-dependency issues, I support you 100% with your personal growth that I've actually provided some other videos, which I'll place here and at the end screen cards that I will give you so you can work on further growth. Also, if you follow me on Instagram I post a lot of self-development books and things that I've learned to help you along your journey.

So let's talk about some questions right now to really figure out if you are codependent. Do you have a fear of rejection or not a fear of rejection in itself, but a fear of abandonment and being alone? Next question I would ask yourself is, do you often feel like the victim? Do you become resentful and feel like you're holding back yourself in this victim stage mentality? Meaning, "She did this to me. She cheated on me. My ex-did this and now I'm messed up." Do you hold yourself in this victim mentality often?

A next question I want to ask you is if you've lost touch with your individuality? If you really don't know exactly what it is that you like anymore, who you are anymore, and haven't been able to spend that time alone to really cultivate a relationship with yourself. Do you find yourself in relationships being disconnected to your own needs, your own feelings, and your own thoughts? More you're connected to your partner's thoughts than you are yourself? If so, this happens a lot with co-dependence relationships because you're scared of losing the other person.

Next is another question I want to ask you is, do you no longer separate your own wishes and desires from your partner? So meaning, do you go off of the wishes and the desires that your partner wants or off of the life that your partner build for you? Do you do things every single day only for your partner without feeling gratified within of going after the goals of what life has offered you? What is it that you want in your life? If you're not focused or driven in this decision, then that can be based off of a co-dependency as well.

A next one would be you're constantly putting other peoples' needs before your own needs. So probably you have a hard time with saying no and you don't like to move forward with saying no because you fear that people aren't going to like you or they're going to be disappointed in you if you say no.

Next is, do you depend on approvals of others to value your own self-worth? So meaning, do you seek validation from other people to make you feel like you're worthy of someone or something?

And lastly, do you make extreme sacrifices to meet your partner's needs? Do you go above and beyond to meet your partner's needs where it feels like it's out of your element and it's just not natural? A lot of the times that this can happen that you lose contact with friends, you lose contact with family and things like that. These personality behaviors and co-dependent personality behaviors and questions that I'm asking you are for you viewers that are kind of unsure what this is and if this is a trait that you might have.

Title: I Cheated And She Knows! | How Do I Fix This?
Description:
I cheated! I cheated on my girlfriend and I want her back! In this video, I talk about cheating and the emotions that you are going through. What lead you to cheat stems from a lack of something and you have to look at this as a place of growth. If you want to attract this woman back into your life I am going to tell you the ways that this is possible. How to move forward after cheating means you have to grow as a person and commit 100% to what you need to do for you. 

#1 What is the reason why you cheated. Or, my partner cheated on me, or you said: "I want to cheat". This will be why I cheated and I cheated on my wife. Figure out what planted the seed and where you are not self- fulfilled within. It's not an excuse but I am one to believe that a relationship is a partnership. You have to feel a type of love for you within. No other women can validate my existence. 

Revenge is the most toxic thing you can ever do in a relationship. You are still unfulfilled and truly don't forgive and then the relationship becomes toxic. 

Tip #2 Forgiving yourself for making this mistake. Go deeper and why this was brought up for you. You have to show action, not words. 

Tip #3 Actions. This is big! Actions are critical in order to show 

Tip #4 Committing to your happiness. Start letting go of guilt. Don't think this comes instantly but once you commit to your happiness then you will be able to show you are changing for the better. When you commit to seeing eachother again. 

Tip #5 Open Communication. Have a vulnerable connection with eachother and the revelation that you have had with yourself. Not bed and plead and say sorry because you are determined to not lose. But letting go and spending time without eachother for you is significant in order to get here and get that relationship back. You have to remember to shift your energy in order to get results.

Title: How To Stop Thinking About Her | 4 Tips!
Description:
How to stop thinking about her. In this video, I tell you 3 tips to start doing today in order for you to change your mindset and stop thinking about her. If you want to get over her I know its difficult and it sucks because when you wake up your thinking about her. When you go to sleep your still thinking about her and when you go to the grocery store your wondering why I can't stop thinking about her. To the point where it's exhausting and your left feeling frustrated. You might even find yourself asking how to forget someone but think about the things that could or could have not happen. You reflect on memories and your just always thinking of her. 

You might be even experiencing a separation and still have that love. But I am going to tell you there is no magic position on how to stop thinking about someone. A relationship in our lives gives us the deepest desire for growth. 

Every human is born to be loved, to feel loved, and to have love. Emotional pain can bring us so much growth if we use the tools. The only way you advance in life to find the love of your life is to focus on you. Personal growth is your biggest driver in life to get the love you want. 

Tip #1 Compassion: we are our own worse critic and sometimes our worse nightmare. There is so much guilt in love and you can stay stuck and recognize how you can move forward. 

Tip #2 Forgiving yourself. Forgive yourself and others around you. What did you do to cause this reaction and focus on forgiving yourself to move forward.

Tip #3 Surround yourself with people that love you and lift you up. You know what it takes for your heart to heal. Your surroundings are what will make you grow.

Tip #4  Try something new! What is it that is going to make you feel gratified right now?

Title: How To Be More Assertive | 3 Tips For Men!
Description:
You're probably thinking, "How can I be more assertive? I am coming off as either a nice guy or a shy guy or I'm always in the friend zone and I'm not getting clear on getting my point across". Assertive does not mean that you have to be disrespectful, it does not mean that you have to be bossy, but it does mean that you have to stand your ground for who you are and have your own opinion. A lot of us deal with this question of what is assertiveness, especially when it comes to relationships, and we frown upon assertiveness as being bossy, telling women what to do or saying get out of my life and I'm the ruler of my life and having this macho, egotistical balance of a relationship when ultimately you're just going to continue to date women and they're not going to want anything to do with you and you're just going to be stuck in this what am I doing, this macho mentality of what am I doing wrong. Or the other macho mentality is pointing fingers at everybody else.

Let's be honest, like I say in a lot of my videos. Whatever you believe, you will attract and it's all about energy. In order to be the assertive man and how to be more assertive does not mean that you have to come off disrespectful, shame other men, shame women or separate and judge. There's too much of that going on in life right now. There are so many separations with all these different movements and as you know, that you've seen if you follow me on Instagram I talk a lot about this, and I talk about why I'm in this field with men because I feel that men need to be heard more than ever these days. I don't do any of these movements.  Assertiveness in relationships, assertive skills, confidence, and assertiveness id so important when you want to know how to become more assertive and how to stand up for yourself. 

Number one, this is the most important and it is aligned with what I was talking about in the beginning of this video, is you have positive confrontations. When something doesn't go right or something doesn't go to the liking of your values, your boundaries, your beliefs when it comes to love, relationships, or friendships, doesn't matter, you speak your opinion but you speak it in a respectful manner, meaning you're not judging anybody else, but you're coming across forceful, opinionated, and holding your own and telling the reasons of why because of your own values. You're not pointing fingers at anybody and shining a light in order for you to be this godly presence because you're wrong and I'm right. No, you're just standing firm and you're having positive interactions, positive conversations, but also know how to confront these things in a positive demeanor. This is a powerful assertive man. When you can get this one thing across to a woman or to other males, this is life-changing and you're looked at in a completely different lens and you have a lot more value to you as a person and as a human.

Number two, it's kind of similar to number one but you say no. You don't always say yes to everything just to fit in or just to get along with other people or just not to have confrontation. Saying no is vital to your energy and to who you are as a person, because of the fact that you won't devalue yourself or submit yourself to doing something else that another person wants you to do but you don't feel like it's right. Because let's be honest, most of the time when we do something that we don't want to do and we don't feel that it's right and is aligned with us, we're miserable in the process, so why even do that because it's just gonna bring you down overall.

Lastly, the next tip is confidence in knowing who you are, meaning confidence doesn't mean that I'm the hottest guy in here and I'm walking up with my chin up, my shoulders back in the nicest outfit. No, confidence means that you hold yourself to a certain standard and a certain respect. You put your passions, you put your goals first in order to know exactly what it is that you want out of life and you want in life, and you have a clear conscious decision and goals of what that looks like and you are determined to work towards that every single day.

Trait #2 : You're passionate about something. What women find attractive is when you talk about your passion and do it! This lights up a fire within you and screams positivity. 

Trait #3 : You don't know you're hot. What women want is not cocky but they want confident. It's pretty nice to know a man isn't always about his looks. 
Trait #4 : You're opinionated. What girls find attractive in guys is when he is opinionated in your beliefs and conversations. You always communicate in a respectful manner because you hold yourself to a standard. 

Trait #5 : You take things slow. Things women find attractive is when you take steps to getting to know her and not lead head first and dive in right away. So you might ask, what do women find attractive in men. Well, its when you are decisive and you know when to lead. 

Trait #6 : He is decisive. What girls find attractive is when a man can give a woman options but make a decision when it comes to how to move forward and where and when you want to set a date. This shows a lot of power.

Title: Girlfriend Pulling Away | #3 Reason Why She Backs Away!
Description:
Girlfriend pulling away and backing away. In this video I give you 3 tips on what to do when she backs away. I know why girls pull away and why women pull away. A lot of times girlfriend losing interest and pulling away can be confusing but it's important to look at your behaviors to see what you might have done to cause this. If your girlfriend doesn't respond or your girlfriend pulls away then you have to create distance as well. If you want to get a girlfriend back you have to first commit to see if she's worth it. If so, then you must encourage yourself to not be a 2nd choice since you deserve to be someones first choice. I see so many men always giving 100% to there relationship when sometimes the woman does not deserve it. The key in all relationships when you are dating and attracting the person, in the beginning, is putting yourself first and taking your time. 

#1- You were too available- she might know she has you where she wants you and she will take advantage of that. Not all women do this but a lot of women will when they don't know what they want and have a lack of respect for themselves. 
#2- She might not be ready for a relationship- possibly she wants to play the field and enjoy her single life. If this is the case then you need to not ignore these red flags and back away immediately. You deserve to be respected and if a woman sees that you don't respect yourself why would she respect you?

#3- She might be dating other people- If this is happening to you then right now is the time to walk away and do not look back. If this woman respects you she will not do this and she will enjoy your company and not seek outside attention from anyone else. 

Last you need to back away too. You have to create distance and distant yourself. Especially when your girlfriend is distant.

Title: How To Get A Girlfriend Tips | 2 Things To SAY NOW!
Description:
How to get a girlfriend! I give you 2 effective tips and things to say to make her yours! We all treasure a relationship between men or women and I am going to tell you how to get a girl! 
Do not think that you have to go fully into what it is that you want in a relationship. It's human nature, we always are more gratified when we feel like we have to work for something especially when it comes to get a girlfriend. Women are used to having to nail down the guy to commit. But if you're saying 'I want to get a girlfriend". I'll show you how in this video!
Do not come off eager and yes you can be coming from a genuine place and want to be honest but she might be thinking you are giving her way to much too soon. Makes her push away and shows your neediness to get a girlfriend and your want to get a girlfriend. 
She will feel like you just want to settle with her and it’s not romantic or rewarding.
So here is what you should do. There are people that will tell you the play a certain game but I am going to give you different scenarios of what can happen. 
First scenario – your out on a date and a woman is asking you what you want. You don’t want to be with a that go with the flow guy but you do want to be seen as a man of value, someone that she is intrigued by and someone she has to work for which is significant in attraction. Say something like this. “ Ultimately, a relationship is something I want in my future but I believe in finding someone who has the same values and aspirations in life and that takes time on whoever that person may be.” 
The last phrase whoever that person may be is POWERFUL. Because you are challenging her and you are still telling her she has a lot to prove to you. Not only does this do this but it also shows that you are a high-value man that holds yourself in a certain power. 

Scenario 2; the conversation never comes up and you continue to date her. Watch that video about how to get a woman to not be able to stop thinking about you which I will put up here on the top right. Follow these steps and eventually, the questions will come up. Like ‘ what are we”, where is this going?  When a woman asked this it means that she might be thinking she wants something more. Then this is what you say. “ yes, ultimately I want that relationship and family but I want to make sure we share the same qualities and values in life. “ By doing this she will see again that you are powerful and find you intriguing. It will be something she knows she can have with you so she will work for it. This is how to get a gf and how to get girls. Even if you want to commit to her then and there make sure you say this as it will help her commit stronger to you. 
The goal here is to hold yourself of value so the woman can see you in that light. No woman wants a man that wants to rush into a relationship and desperate to find the one. She wants to feel like she was chosen. Yes, it is kind of similar to that fairy tale story but that’s what makes a woman desire you emotionally, and sexually and that’s ultimately what you want. Not to be taken for granted! This is how to get her to like you and how to get a good girlfriend.

Title: Dating After Divorce For Men | 7 Transformational Tips!
Description:
Dating after divorce for men! In this video, we talk about dating after divorce. Let’s face it divorce sucks! So many of divorced men have stories about why you were divorced and your either 1. Scared to date again 2. Don’t even know how and where to start or 3. Just looking for that little glimmer of hope on your next steps because your not even sure if this is something that you want to do right now. Then this video is for you! If you haven’t been divorced and getting out of a long-term relationship you will get some great tips from this video as well. I know divorce can be messy and some not so much so in this video I am going to give you actionable tips that you can start today and implement as you get the time so you can start to get in touch with your roots and possibly date again when you are ready! By no means am I telling you to date now but these tips will prepare you to make that decision. Also, if you're ready to date now then let's get started and not waste any more time! 

Divorce tips for men.
Tip #1: Reconnect with your old friends. Typically when you are married you might have lost touch with some old friends. Try reconnecting with them and going out with them from time to time. If for some reason you do not have old friends that you can reconnect with then start involving yourself in an activity where you can meet people. There is a site depending on where you live called meetup.com that will really help you meet some new people in your area. Also, if you already started reconnecting with some of your friends and you have started going out and doing something with them then great.
Tip #2: Understand that you are okay with yourself: This is how to start dating after divorce. Look at this new phase of your life as an opportunity process the old relationship. Do something that you have been wanting to do for so long but possibly couldn’t because of your time or marriage. Take this time to spend alone and get back to who you are. Divorce has a real emotional impact and a lot of people discredit the feeling that divorce brings so don’t ignore that. You are not alone even if you have to reach out to other guys for help that have been divorced because they can be your greatest source of strength. So, if you have the means for and possibly the children are with there mom then take a trip somewhere, buy a motorcycle, go skydiving, go rock climbing. 
Tip #3: Change your wardrobe and look! Revamp your style and start looking at fashion trends online and start dressing the way you want to dress that will give you more confidence. When you feel good about what you have on then you have an inner confidence that shines through and an energy that becomes magnetic. You might just get hit on when you are out and about! This is the best dating advice for divorced men.
Tip #4: Date someone who is exactly opposite of your wife but has the same goals. If you want children again or in the future then date someone that wants the same. If not, then look for a woman who does not want to have children or may already have children. Meaning physically, personality, and life goals. Date who you want to date and take this time to really educate yourself on the different women out there. Don’t feel pressure to commit right away. Divorce and dating is meant to be taken slow. 
Tip #5: Get re-educated on women. I mean after a long-term relationship or marriage we are a little bit rocky when it comes to dating again because the world is consistently evolving and that even means when it comes to dating, It might not be as easy as it was for you before so start watching videos and reading blogs about the attraction process and dating again so you can get comfortable with the idea.

Tip #6: Give Online Dating a shot: This is the #1 way these days to land a date and start talking to women. You can use online dating as a tool to learn how to talk to women again and see what women are out there. Remember take your time into the online dating and when you feel ready do it! Specially if you are seeking dating after divorce in your 40's.

Tip #7; Design your own life! How do you want to live the next years of your life?

Description:
How to get a woman to think about you non-stop! In this video, I am going to show you how to make a woman think about you. This starts with the emotional connection that you are able to connect with her. An emotional connection does not mean that you get over emotional and talk about your deepest desires. The emotional connection means show her that you are the guy that she wants. So the time you spend with her is very important to the attraction phase. Make this time fun, light, and make your presence known. Also, this is how to get a woman to think about you all the time. So this video is going to be about how to get a girl to think about you and for her to continue to think about you once you are in that stage of spending time together and now you want her to think about you!
