[SOCIAL MEDIA]
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/apollonialov...
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/apollonia_ponti/

Apollonia Ponti


Tip #1: Do not be predictable! This is the most important. You want to show an imbalance (meaning you should have things going on in your life and your goals and aspirations are important to you)  she will find this attractive and want to attract you! Meaning if you text her good morning or good night all the time they don’t do it too much anymore. See if she starts. Also, don’t respond too early to her text. Make her wait and get excited to see your name pop up on her phone. This is how you make a woman want you and how to make her like you.
Tip #2: Be mysterious. Let her wonder what you are doing. Do not post everything that you are doing every single second like what you are eating for dinner where you are for happy hour instead post things less if you are active on social media. Also being mysterious means temporarily disappearing.( not days or weeks. But maybe a couple hours throughout your day if you REALLY are busy) You don’t want to disappear for too long but disappear long enough where it gets her wondering what you are up to. So if it takes you a whole day to reply to her morning text and then at night you finally text back say this. “ I’ve had such a busy day! I hope your day was great. I am going to head to bed as I have a long day tomorrow. Talk soon and goodnight.” This message shows her she is not your priority and women love this! This is how to get her thinking of you and this is what to do when a girl likes you. They see you have a life that you love and it shows stability. This leads me to 3.
Tip #3: Do this a couple times. Not just once. There are some dating coaches that will tell you to go off the radar for three days but let's be honest if this woman is attractive and has her pick she isn’t going to be turned on by this because it just seems shady. You just have to pop in and out! But on your terms, because you are so busy. Keep this up for about 3 days. Once you start engaging in conversation she is going to be thinking about what you are really doing? She might think things like was he with another girl, what is he doing that he is so invested in that he isn’t giving me the time of day. This stands out from what other men are doing! Remember you want to be less predictable during this time which enhances her attraction. I mean most of the time this girl might even say “ when am I going to see you again” when you reach back out to her. 
So tip #4 Making the plans after being busy. When you start chatting with her again just let her know you’ve been busy with work but also focus the conversation on what she has been up to because you do not want to fully answer her questions. Once you do this schedule something with her eventually and not right away. Why? The time that passes will get her excited to see you again. That time is critical to the attraction phase. Say something like” hey I am busy the next two days but have some time on Friday. Would you like to grab a drink then?”? 

I encourage all my clients to do this. Do not become a text messaging buddy make sure your text messages are simple, and to the point.

Title: Dating A Narcissist Woman! | 3 Stages of A Narcissist | How To Move Forward!
Description:
Dating a narcissist woman! This video will talk about dating a narcissist and narcissism when it comes to stages. You will be able to identify what this is with the narcissistic personality disorder and traits that I talk about in this video. Narcissistic abuse is real. Narcissistic women are out there and it's up to you to get out of these relationships. I will help you identify female narcissist traits and narcissists in a relationship and how they act. Especially a female narcissist so you can know how to spot a narcissist when it comes to dating and relationships. 

 Now, so many of you may wonder what is a narcissist and how do I know I am dating one. Let’s be honest when you have a beautiful woman with you it can be very difficult to say goodbye when she has two of the prime thing your attracted to. Beauty and great sex. But if you stay in these relationships they can end up ruining your life and to be honest you can lose yourself. So here are the traits of a narcissistic woman. 

Stage #1 : The beginning. When a woman is all in and its too good to be true. She treats you like a king and puts you on a pedestool. She will make you feel like you finally found the one and please you every moment she gets where it feels too good to be true. Something during this time is going to feel off but you cant put your finger one it. Once a target has been chosen, it’s almost like the Narcissist gets tunnel vision. They are hyper-vigilant in their pursuit and will project the perfect image that their victim wants them to be. They are excessively caring, loving and attentive at this stage. They shower their targets with attention, compliments and literally sweep them off their feet.


Stage  #2 : The middle stage. Once she knows how she has you from a couple weeks to months. Typically when she knows that you have secured your love and devotion she will change. It could be a gradual shift or something that happens overnight. 

Stage # 3: They disappear! Here is the thing I want to be clear about. Some may disappear and leave you baffled but a lot of times they will disspear and then pop right back in so they know they have some sense of control over you. 
Trying to get over this type of relationship is hard. Once this is over you can be an emotional reck because not only did you not get your closer but your self-esteem has been annihilated be demanding and betrading behavior, insults and the highs and lows. Depending on how long you were in the relationship and let it get the best of you it can be difficult to break-free from these relationships. Why? There is an endorphin rush of emotions because this type of relationship gets you addicted to the highs and lows that when you start to date someone else you could find them boring because you were more excited with the other woman. Meaning you thought about her more, you were sexually into her more, and you had stronger feelings but this is simply because of the highs and lows of your relationship and the internal mind games that were played to get to where you are now. 

These people become moody and will place blame on you for everything. So it becomes harder to walk away as you start finding yourself demanding attention from them and it can become a cycle. Here is the thing. If you find yourself in a relationship like this today I want to tell you something. The Narcissist isn’t one to throw away a potential supply meaning you. They will keep up with this I love you as long as you allow them to. They will breeze in and out of your life as if nothing ever happened and you will be left suffering. 

You need to be real with yourself and cut off all communication and start the process on healing from this relationship. You aren’t the victium as you have a choice. For the men that are watching that aren’t in the relationships these are good signals of ones so you don’t fall into these relationships. Remember, these are common relationships for men and women and but I am here to talk to you men about this. If you find yourself in a relationship like this today. I personally invite you to reach out to me so we can work on guiding you towards bigger and better things as I am here for you.

Title: 4 Tips: When A Woman Rejects You | How To Fix It!
Description:
When a woman rejects you it can hurt your ego right? But listen, a woman does not reject you without a reason. So in this video not only am I going to talk about rejection but also talk about why women reject men. I am going to give you 4 tips that you might be going through right now on reasons why a woman rejects men and then how to change that. Depending on the type of woman you are dealing with you have to understand how to gage her body language and communication. You have to be able to pick up what she is putting out so you know how to not get rejected. Reasons, why a woman rejects a man, is because she was turned off in some way or basically is loyal to someone else. For the sake of this video, we will be talking about her being turned off. You can change this and I will make you understand how in this video. Also, I talk about how to handle rejection and how to act when a girl rejects you so you are not damaged by it and how to move forward. I know you want to know how to not be rejected so if you follow these key steps you will have a better understanding of how. 

Remember not everyone is everyone's cup of tea but rejection is also redirection. Learn from your mistakes and never come off too eager to get a woman's attention. She has to pay to play too. Remember that!

Tip #1 - Your actions are being friend zoned. This does not mean that you cannot change your mind. Women just need some convincing. Change the pace of this. 
Tip#2 - You're too aggressive or not aggressive enough. 
Tip#3- Tip #3 We want a confident man. This has nothing to do with looks. Women will date a confident man before a good-looking man. Confidence to women represent the that you can take control. We want to be lead and we want to know that you can lad us, love us and gives a sense of direction since women like the romance and even when we are that confident women we like to know that we can be taken care of physically and emotionally and you doing that proves to us that you can. 
Tip #4: Tip #4 You are not putting in effort. One of the most things women talk about all the time is men do not put in the effort. Don’t assume that this means money and you have to spend lots of money on her but it comes down to the thought. 
So, the answer is to PACE YOURSELF! Give her that time away from you in order to create that chase. This is going to give you a great advantage! Examples: Let’s go get coffee but I only have 20 minutes then I have to go. Or text her saying “Hey, I am busy this week but able to make some time for Friday night let’s do dinner at 7pm? How’s that sound” Pace yourself, but also show that you are busy this will make a girl want more. Not only will she see that you are putting her as a priority in your busy schedule she is going to take the time she spends with you of value because she knows it's meaningful. Show her the potential that you have to offer.

If you have any comments or questions please feel free to comment below as I love hearing from you!

Title: She Cancels Date | How To Reply To A Canceled Date Text!
Description:
She cancels date on me and I don't know what to do? Apollonia, how to reply to a canceled date text? In this video, I give you the exact way you should reply to a woman if she has a last minute date cancellation, and if she cancels a date last minute. The key thing here men is to understand that when you set a date you do not have to do or say anymore. The silence is what keeps the woman yearning for more sometimes. You want to always appear less unavilable and yes, some of you might call this games but we cannot cheat human nature. You have to build the anticipation and attraction if you dont then she might not appreciate you as much. Cancel date last minute can lead up to a lot of frusuration and if this woman does not give you a good excuse when she flaked on you or she cancels date last minute then it's time to move on. If she did this here is your cancelled date response. " Ok, have a great day." Then, don't respond back! 

If youre still hesitant then tell her "ok, you let me know when you would like to go out." Then dont reach back out at all. Cancelled first date happens but does not happen often if a woman is interested in spending time with you. If you feel that a woman canceled a date with you because of an emergency and the excuse was real then lets be honest and wish her well and tell her to reach out to you when she is ready. Trust me, she will! 

Take care of you first and do not give into the mind games that some woman will play with you. You have to get rid of these women that play these games and move forward with the right ones. So, this video will give you the opportunity to look at both sides. Either to blow her off, or give her another opportunity. The best tip out of all of this is if she texts or calls you back to reschedule.

Title: 5 Great Reasons For Being Single!!!
Description:
5 great reason for being single! So many of us think that single isn't great but it truly is! Enjoy it while it last because most of the time being single will not be forever. In this video, I give you reasons for being single and reasons to love being single.

I know sometimes you don't choose the single life because you might not be meeting the quality of woman that you want to meet so it becomes harder for you to have faith. I can guarantee that the moment you change your outlook on this situation you can attract a quality woman into your life, but this also comes down to your habits and your dating habits. If you find yourself asking "why am I single"? I encourage you to book a session with me so we can change some things that you may be doing wrong. Here is some dating advice on why being single is great! 

#1 You get to think and plan for yourself! If you want to go on a week-long vacation you can pick up and go somewhere! 
#2 You can watch everything you want and listen to everything you want at the moment you want. 
#3 You get to choose! A lot of us tend to bad mouth and focus on the lack instead of the positive things. At the end of the day, every good person and the bad person faces challenges in dating. You can choose who you want to be with. 
#4 Enjoy the moment. It will not be forever no matter who you are. If you are trying to actively date and cultivate a relationship your efforts will come together eventually if you don't lose sight of having fun and putting yourself out there. 
#5 Have Fun and don't try to control too much! Stay true to who you are.

Title: How To Stop Being Clingy In A Relationship | Advice From Two Experts!
Description:
How to stop being clingy in a relationship. This video is going to give you clarity on how to stop being clingy in a relationship. 

French Relationship Expert Channel Here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCf48cuBYtLEGEwAN7EoldlQ

Being clingy and needy is not attractive we all know this. 
#1: Understand why you're so clingy in a relationship stop being needy because you think you want to give love to someone instead of receiving love. How to stop being needy is to stop being emotionally dependent on this person. How to not be clingy starts by the "why" and the "how".

#2: The "why": Stop ignoring your neediness by not paying attention to what has happened to you in the past. I always talk to men about how to stop being clingy and needy.

We also talk about how to stop being a clingy guy when you've been cheated on in the past or in a present relationship. Forgiveness is huge when you understand the source of the trouble. 

When you want to save the relationship there is a lot of feeling around resentment and how to stop being clingy and jealous will never result in a positive change if you are holding on to resentment. 

Focus on the present moment and yourself. What are the things that make you happy? Start working on stabilizing your life and being happy with yourself and being alone with you. Try dating yourself! 

Being passionate about something will help you be less dependent on your partner so your not that clingy person that you don't want to be anymore. Incorporate new things in your relationship.

Don't look at flirting as you have to get her to like you. You don't want to be that guy that does not know how to approach her so in this video I am going to give you the top signs that you may be doing so you can flirt without being creepy. 
Here are my flirting tips on how to flirt with a woman and how to not be creepy. 

Tip #1 Look to see if she has a wedding ring. Do not be that guy that does not see this. 
Tip #2- Do settle glances at her every once and a while. So she sees you flirting with her with your eyes. This is how to flirt without being creepy. This opens up the space for tip #3.
Tip #3-Go up to her and introduce yourself with confidence. 
Tip #4- Smile! 
Tip #5- Compliment Her. Hold you're grown and stay firm and let her see how confident you are. 
Tip #6- Ask her for her number. After the both of you have been talking for a bit. Do not ask her for her number without creating some type of interaction for a while. 
Tip #7- Understand her personal space. 

If you have troubles approaching women and are timid about how to approach or let your personality shine through then right now is your time to book a session with me. I will help you get to where you want to be when it comes to talking to women and getting the woman you really want.

Title: How To Argue In A Relationship | 4 Tips You MUST KNOW!
Description:
In this video, we talk about how to argue in a relationship. Arguments can lead a relationship from being healthy to unhealthy so that's why is so important when you reach a disagreement in your relationship you can learn how to argue and grow from it. I know conflict in relationship is not easy and sometimes can be very frustrating. 

That's why when you can take a moment and think about the true reason of why your fighting and stop attaching to the outcome of you being right. So many couples attach to the outcome of them being right that they never know how to resolve a conflict. 

At the end of the day, they want to be right and that's it. So whats important here is even when you want to know "how to stop arguing in a relationship or how to argue better in a relationship that it's not about who is winning. At the end of the day, you both love each other and want to be heard. So who is not hearing who? 

So many clients like me. Apollonia, "how to argue better in ar relationship or how to prevent arguing in a relationship?" I always say you cannot prevent it. Society has places arguing in such a bad role in relationships but at the end of the day, this is what makes your relationship grow. 

It's about how to fix arguing in a relationship the right way and not losing respect and if your arguing daily then this might be a sign of the famous question your asking yourself. How much arguing is healthy in a relationship. 

If you find yourself dealing with this now in your relationship I advise you to reach out to me so we can move you towards healthy arguments in your relationship without setbacks.

Title: Signs You're In The FRIEND ZONE! 6 Signs & How To Get Out!
Description:
How to get out of the friend zone. In this video, we talk about why you are falling into the friend zone and the ways on how to avoid the friend zone in the future. You can use these tips now if you find yourself getting out of the friend zone. 

Tip # 1: Do not be passive! Always have your opinion on what you want and don't be afraid to say what you like and you don't like. 

Tip #2: Don't always agree with her and encourage the banter. Be flirtatious and keep her on her toes. You can make fun of her and joke around here and there but respectfully. 

Tip #3 Flirt and own it! This means to flirt with her without coming from fear and own it when you do.  Take suttle steps first with her every once and a while and communicate with body language. 

Tip #4 Touch her. Formulate that physical attraction with her. If you do things together now is the time to incorporate some physical feelings. 

Tip #5 Have a life outside of her and dress the part. What I mean by this is not always doing things for her and on her time. Do things that feed your soul and don't put those on the back burner for her. Also, when you dress the part remember to dress nicely for whatever you do. Women are attracted to a well put together man and just because of your friends does not mean that you can just slip on a dirty t-shirt. This helps you create a desire for a woman. 

Tip #6 Don't focus on her 100%. When you are around friends talk to her friends and don't always give her too much focus and do not be too available for her all the time. Changing the pace will help you get out of the friend zone because you are changing your behaviors. 

When you do these tips you give her the option and she can take it from here. If she notices your different by your actions she will mention it eventually once she does she can decide if she wants to be friends with you or not. If not, here is my advice. If you can stay friends with her great! You can always get introduced to her other friends and might find your soulmate that way. :) 

Remember to maintain your dignity and self-respect.

Title: How To Be Confident Around Girls | 8 Life Changing Tips!
Description:
How to be confident around girls. 8 real-life tips that work and I practice with my clients. A lot of people struggle with how to be confident and men struggle with how to talk to girls and build their confidence. The 8 tips I share with you are meant for you to take back and work on. There is no quick fix for how to be confident with girls. It takes work and that's what I am here to share with you today. I can guarantee if you 100% follow these tips. It will build your confidence. 

Here are the 8 tips on how to have confidence with girls. 

Tip #1: Be direct and stick to your word. Don't be submissive if you think that she may not like you. How to build confidence around girls is all about your approach to being direct but always being respectful. 

Tip #2: Don't expose your negative qualities. Don't talk about your negative qualities in hopes that she will think this is cute. It's not it automatically puts you in the friend zone. Instead, work on them, and being confident around girls will become easier. 
 
Tip# 3: Take a compliment and don't feel like you have to compliment her back. When you hold your ground is when you compliment her when you want to compliment her. Don't overly compliment but be direct and make your words known this is the key to confidence around girls. 

Tip #4: Find support, men that are your friends, and help you with conversations when you are talking to women. If you have guy friends that are confident with this ask them to help. Use your resources and this will help you be confident around girls and how to build confidence around women. 

Tip #5: Use affirmation in your mind to control your limiting beliefs. Use affirmations like " I got nothing to lose" I know my worth" I got this. Say this to yourself because mindset creates energy and you want your energy to be good so keep up the great thoughts so it impacts the woman you go out with. 

Tip #6: Limiting beliefs. Let go of the bad thoughts and acknowledge them and then use affirmations to them right back when they come up so you can start controlling these limiting beliefs. Be in the present moment with her and release the pressure of what you have to do. 

Tip #7 Get out there. No one is going to come to get you off your couch and find you. You have to put in the effort. So go out with friends, join a dating app. Do what it takes to build your confidence and being confident around girls. 

Tip # 8 Work on self-development and continue to do that. How can you advance yourself as a man? Where are the points that need focus?

Tip #9 Attitude comes through with body language so remember to control the way you think and engage and adjust your attitude before your approach. If you have a positive attitude you will have a positive approach.

Title: 6 Dating Hacks To Make Her Fall For You!
Description:
Make her fall for you with these 6 dating tips! 

#1: Don't just be friends with her to get to know her. You have to show her that you might be slightly interested to make her want you more. Tell her she's sexy, and call a date a date. 

Tip #2: Don't text her all day every day. Your text should only mean business. This can be an easy trap to fall into the friend zone. Make sure your text means business by making plans and seeing her. She must see you busy too. 
Tip#3: Focus on your goals: Encourage them to see them more when you guys are dating. 
Tip #4: Stand your ground and be grounded. If you see a lack of respect then you need to call these things out. This is how you get a girl to like you. You have to challenge her to be the best version of herself. Do not be too needy because you will lose your dignity and this is not how to get a woman to like you. 
Tip #5: Go with the flow. Don't over-talk and take a breath. Sit back and have a little swag and do not give her everything. She is a mystery just as much as you. Don't show all your cards before she even gives you a hand to play. 
Tip #6: Do something adventurous. This helps the relationship thrive and it's exciting. Plan out something fun and it can be on the spur of the moment. If she says no, it's ok. Just try it again another time.

Once you start following these steps you will know some of the key things on how to attract women and how to make a girl like you.  

Understanding how to build an emotional connection with a woman is how you make her fall in love.

Title: I Can't Get Over Her | 6 Reasons Why & How To Get Over Her!
Description:
In this video, you get clarification on why you can't get over her. Especially after a break-up. I know these times are hard that's why it's important I made a video for you about this but also gave you pointers on how to get over her and move forward. These actionable tips are going to help you understand getting over an ex, or getting over a girlfriend. 

These tips help you heal heartbreak so you can stop saying to yourself " I can get over her." I can guarantee that if you follow these tips you will stop saying and thinking that " I can't get over my ex-girlfriend." 

If you decided to break up or if she decided to break up with you these are all going to play a significant part in the healing process. Stop thinking about the past and what you cannot control. A lot, of people, look back and see breakups as mistakes and this is a learning tool. What you cannot do when you are trying to get over a woman is by living in the past. The best thing you can do is work on yourself. 

Also, stop chasing the "what if" this is still chasing the past and will be harder for you to get over her. So the question that pertains to " what if" is " What if she did this?" "What if I said this?" 

Instead, ask yourself what can you do right now that will make you feel better and improve your life? 

Tips on how to get over her.

# 1: Stop all communication. 
# 2: Stop Idolizing 
# 3: Keep Busy 
#4 : Personal Development

Title: She Won't Commit | 5 Reasons Why!
Description:
This video tells you exactly why she won't commit and what to do moving forward. Remember you have control over how your emotions can be handled when you meet a girl. You have to be able to see red flags. 

Tip# 1: She is having fun and loving her freedom. She might be coming out of a relationship, or just graduated and looking to be single because she hasn't been single for a while or she might just love being single! 

Tip #2: You're too friendly. You have to call the shots and claim exactly what you like and show a woman your interest but on your time and nothing else so you don't fall into the friend zone. 

Tip # 3: She's dating other people. If a woman is dating other people then you should too! She probably also does not have any interest in you and you cannot get her to commit. When she won't commit then you have to move on. 

Tip #4: You're too available. So she has all the power in the relationship and she won't commit. Commitment comes with a give and takes partnership because both of you want it. 

Tip #5: She might be scared of getting hurt. She is unsure of how to play her next move. If this has happened to you then you need to take your time if you feel it's the right investment and she is the right woman. Still, flirt with her, have fun, but not always be 100% there for her. 

This dating advice for men is for you to go confidently in the direction of what you want but I don't want you to chase a woman who does not respect you. For her to have you a woman should have to work for it.

Title: 6 Signs She Likes You | She Likes You If She Does This!
Description:
6 signs she likes you! This video is a video where I give you signs of different women! Shy women and not-so-shy women! Depending on the type of girl you have your eye on you will see which sign speaks to you. Let's be honest some women aren't always the easiest to read and it's hard to tell if a girl likes you. You probably asking yourself "does she like me"? 

If so you found the right place to be! She likes you signs are always pretty spot on so that's why you must pay close attention to these signs so you're not wondering "is she into me"?. 

Shy Women:

Tip#1 - she might not give you eye contact and when she does it's brief and she turns red and sometimes gets a little fidgety. When a shy girl has a crush she sometimes does not know how to react. 

Tip #2- she primps herself with lipstick and always wants to look her best in front of you. 

Tip # 3- She looks down and giggles a lot. She might giggle even when you say something that's not funny. It's because she feels uncomfortable. 

Extrovert Women 

Tip #1 She complements you. She tells you that you are handsome or cute and you catch her looking at you and smiling a lot. 

Tip #2 She says "yes" to do something else after the date.

Tip #3 She tells you she had fun after the date. She might message you and say that she enjoyed her day or night with you and she would like to see you again. 

What tips did I share with you today that's happened to you with a woman?

Title: How To Make A Woman Attracted To You | 4 Tips!
Description:
How to make a woman attracted to you is an important part of the dating and courting phase of the relationship. If you like a girl right now then watch this video. These are 4 important steps in the attraction phase. I talk about how to make a woman addicted to you and also share my dating advice with you since I know what it takes on how to attract a girl. If you have someone that you are dating right now and trying to figure out how to make a girl like you then I strongly suggest for you implement these tips. 

Tip #1- Do not be too emotionally needy. Do not let your emotions thrive off of another women's behavior. This is also known as attachment and emotional dependencies. This actually has the opposite effect on how to attract a girl. When you want to attract a woman into your life this actually has the opposite effect than what you're hoping for. Telling her how you feel too early on can work out as a disadvantage! Remember to take things slow!

Tip #2- Remember the things that she likes and she tells you. This is key. Remember the important things. When you do it you start to show that you care and value the things that she has to say and what is important to her. 

Tip #3- State your opinion, be flirty, and don't always overly compliment her. This is how to attract women. This is so critical to not overly complicate the attraction stage by diving in headfirst. MYSTERY MEN! Tease a woman and don't be afraid of light banter. 

Tip #4- Don't overly talk: You need to be relaxed and open to hearing her and building a relationship with her. Not always speaking too much and saying more than what you want to limit yourself from falling into the friend zone. Don't always be too available by texting her all day. Make sure you call the shots in the beginning which will make her want to see you more. Create mystery when it comes to how to attract women. This is key for men! Mystery Mystery Mystery! 

As I always say. If a woman isn't giving you the time of day then out your attention towards something else. You deserve a woman who will respect you and have a mutual balance of feelings for you. There are human attraction facts!

Title: How To Talk To A Woman on Facebook | 3 Tips To Success!
Description:
This video talks about how to message a girl on Facebook and how to get a date immediately on Facebook. Let's be honest sometimes we just need a refresher on how to talk to a woman on Facebook because in our day in age social media is almost everything. When it comes to work, travel, food, working out, and even dating! 

How to talk to a woman on social media comes with a couple tweaks that need to happen on your profile. You always want to make sure your profile picture is you and not with 5 other men so she's left wondering who you are. Also, show your adventurous side and flaunt photos of the things that you like to do. This will help you figure out how to talk to a woman you like.

The goal is you want her to see your lifestyle because you want to make her a part of it. Once you speak to her and she approves you explore her profile page and also look into the things that she likes to do. Once you do this then this will allow you to learn how to chat with a girl on Facebook or how to talk to a woman you like. 

Something you will do to initiate the conversation is mention something about what she likes to do as you will investigate her profile pictures. This shows a woman that you actually put in some energy to try and get to know her. 

Here is how to chat with a girl on Facebook example. (Let's say she likes yoga) "Hey, hope you're having a great day. My name is Andrew and I noticed you like Yoga and I see that you do Yoga in California hills and I go there every once in a while too and I love it. What is it that you love most about yoga? This is what I love most...." This is exactly how to chat with a girl in messenger. You are putting energy into your message and you're sticking out from a lot of other people out there. 

The dont's! Do not call her sexy, beautiful, etc...

::

.
#2 Have Goals & Put Yourself First- get more comfortable with saying “no” than saying “yes” all the time. Get rid of the people-pleaser mentality and honor your true wants and needs. .

.

.
#5 Slow Down- take your time, don’t over speak, and take your time getting to know a woman. Don’t overcompensate for who you are and what you can offer. Don’t overly complicate things by showing her too much love.

Title: How To Start Conversations with a Woman | Advice From Two Experts
Description:
How To Start Conversations with a Woman Part 1. In this video, we discuss how to approach women and how to start conversations with a girl. I know sometimes it can be intimidating or fearful to really approach and learn how to approach women but in this video two experts talk about the ways to approach and also overcome fears that you might be experiencing right now! 

How to talk to women is always something that is tailored to your personality. There is no perfect way of doing it or perfect thing that you can say but what makes it better for a woman is when a man comes off calm and confident with himself. 

Body Language: Make sure that you are not too close to her and in her personal space. Also, make sure that no matter where you are when you approach her you are standing up tall, not slouching and making eye contact. You want to make sure that your body is facing her and no one else so she gets the idea that you are trying to give her the attention and no one else. 

Handshake: depending on where you are and if you are getting to know her at a bar or through friends a handshake or a kiss on the cheek depending on cultural differences is the way to start to greet her. This is a way of making physical contact so your presence can be known. 

Smile: Women love to see a man that smiles! This is a great thing because it shows that you are nice and you are confident. Smiling speaks a thousand words that you can't say. So make sure you do it! 

Behavior and Confidence: Don’t change your behavior to be someone else that your not. Your behavior should not be a cocky man and overly confident just be humble and know that you are worth everything and more. 

Speak to her like your best friend: forget that she is a beautiful woman and you might want to get her number. Just stay in the present moment that you just want to talk to her. Don't forget the goals. You will have so much more confidence and charisma and then you will see how she reciprocates. Once that happens the attraction process will be very fluid. 

Ask her questions about her: Women love to talk about themselves so ask them questions about them so it helps you ease the tension in the beginning. 

Starting a conversation naturally flows after you become calm and just go with the flow. To do this comes from confidence. So in this video, it's our goal to motivate you to do just that. How to talk to a woman will be easier after watching this. I always look forward to your comments below. XOXO

Title: 3 Signs She's Not Into You & What To Say Next!
Description:
3 important signs she's not into you and also what to say when you talk to a girl and you see she's not into you. I give you the key thing to say to a woman when you get turned down if you were to approach her. Your true confidence comes from how well you hold your own and stay grounded with a woman. Not only do I share the most important signs of how to detect signs she's not interested but I also share some dating tips so you don't have to feel as though you are rejected next time you date or talk to a woman. Signs she's not into you and signs she's not interested are common things most men don't look for. 

So my intention is for me to bring these to your reality so you don't go for days without noticing. If any of these signs she doesn't like you ring a bell then move on. Someone out there is waiting for you! 

I know it can be so horrible to fall for a woman to only find out that she doesn't like you and your feeling like gezzz what did I do wrong that she did not like me. In this video, I am going to give you some tips that you can follow to make sure that these women that you date don't have these characteristics. The thing I am going to discuss in this video is what women do when they are just not interested. 

Tip #1 - Short with her text messages, or gives you one-word answers, and slow in responding. 

Tip #2- She always refers to you as a friend.

Tip #3- Is she too comfortable with you? 

You want this woman to always think about if she looks pretty and she tries her best to look sexy because a woman that wants you always wants to impress you. You never want her to be too comfortable early on.  

Also, what do you do when you approach a woman with an attitude. I talk about that in this video. Remember the key lessons are to stay grounded and be 100% confident. Watch this video for 2 options on how to respond.

Title: Am I In a Toxic Relationship: 3 Signs It's The Wrong Relationship!
Description:
Am I in a toxic relationship? This video will give you your answers! This is a popular question many ask as well as signs it's the wrong relationship so this leads me to create a video about toxic relationships. I hope by watching this video you can identify with being in the wrong relationship, toxic relationship, bad relationships, narcissistic abuse, and emotional abuse. I give you signs to pay attention to if you feel like your boyfriend or girlfriend is toxic. I know this relationship advice can be a sensitive topic so if you need anyone on one coaching I am always here for you as I provided the link below. The key takeaways are to observe your behaviors in the relationship and ask yourself does this person bring you joy, passion, and abundance? Instead of worry, regret, anger, and anxiety or anxiousness. Relationships are meant to enhance our lives to grow together. This doesn't mean that you don't have arguments but you have arguments in a way that the both of you learn, grow and you both have each other's best interest in mind. 

Signs you in a toxic relationship can be controlling behavior by saying what you can do, say, and wear. 

There is no emotional support and in turn, you can look for it somewhere else. Also, this leads to belittling and namecalling. This is intolerable in a relationship, Your partner might say I'm just kidding but this is still a form of emotional abuse. I give you different scenarios around this in this video. 

I can sit here and come across a lot of scenarios but in this video, I mention the most popular and common signs. 
1. Controlling and Jealous
2. No emotional support 
3. Belittling and name-calling you. 

The things you say when you stay in this relationship. 
1. But I love her or him. 
2. We've been together for so long - don't add time that has no existence to this ongoing relationship. 
3. I don't see a future without him. 
4. I won't find someone that loves me like him or her...

Title: Dating Several People At Once: Should You Do It ??
Description:
Dating several people at once can be a tricky if you want to have healthy relationships. My dating advice and dating tips will be explained in this video. Dating multiple men or dating multiple people isn’t always the best idea. Why? Because typically when dating multiple people you are giving your time to those who aren’t showing up for you 100%. The key in this video is not how to date multiple people or about dating multiple guys and dating multiple girls but its about showing up 100% to those that do the same for you. Ultimately if you want a relationship dating 2 people at once isn’t something that I would recommend unless they are both giving you 100% and then you should be honest with the both of them. Title: How To Balance Work Life & Love : For Men
Description:
Hey There!
I am so happy you are here! I know work-life balance and love life can be two difficult things to manage. As your love coach, I felt that it was very important to give you some dating advice and relationship advice in this video. Finding a good work-life balance is essential to your happiness and life. In this video, we talk about how to manage work and personal life and how to manage a relationship. Communication in a relationship is so important to have a healthy life. 

 I know how difficult it can be for a man to manage a busy career and also a relationship. I hear it all the time from men and that's why I decided to do this video. In this video, I speak about the steps that you take in a relationship and before the relationship. 
1- Understand that it's ok to tell a woman what you expect from her. Ultimately if this is a woman in your life you are building a foundation for the both of you so it's going to require work from both of you. Be open and tell her even the little things that are meaningful to you. 
2- Make sure your woman knows what you are doing. Even if she is with you make sure you take the time to make her feel like she is a part of something. 
3- If you travel often give her the option to come with you or invite her on that 30 min only lunch break you have. The effort is what women look for and remember! 

AND MUCH MORE! 

I love to hear from you. Please leave a comment below and if you have any questions or need any tailored feedback.

Title: How To Practice Self-Love: 8 Powerful Steps To Self-Love!!
Description:
Hello Everyone, 

I am so honored you are here! Self-Love is such an amazing gift you can give yourself. It is probably one of the best gifts you can give yourself. Let's be honest. Life can get difficult but how we make it easier is by putting ourselves first and honoring where we are in this moment of now. I talk about ways you can become happier through self-love. 
Step 1 Compassion: Viewing others and yourself with a loving heart. 
Step 2 Don't be your worst critic: Don't bash or talk down to yourself. Like, say "you're so stupid, fat, ugly." 
Step 3 Self-Kindness: Treat your body like a temple. Do things that make you happy and healthy. 
Step 4: Mindfulness: Stepping out and not identifying yourself with negative stories. Be open to the people that you have in your life. 
Step 5: Allow Yourself To Be Human: Don't take things too seriously! The greatest thing about life is you can mess up but you can do things right too. 
Step 6: Forgiveness: Forgive yourself for things you did in the past and develop new habits when the situations reappear. The way you do this is through forgiveness. 
Step 7: Self-Talk: Words of affirmation when you feel yourself slipping! Read a book, listen to music, go running, etc. 
Step 8: Understand That You Are Not Perfect: Because your flaws make you perfect. Be present!

xoxo, 
Apollonia

Title: How To Control Your Emotions: After A Breakup!
Description:
Hello Everyone,

In this video, I speak about how to control your emotions after a breakup. I know these times can be difficult when you experience a breakup especially if you thought this relationship would last forever. In this video, I speak about how to important it is to feel the emotions of the breakup and not just ignore them. What is vital to your personal growth is being present with your feelings not ignoring them and then for you to move on. Moving on doesn't mean cutting this person out of your life forever if you can still see a future with them but bettering yourself and taking accountability for what the relationship ended up going downhill. The biggest thing I see couples doing that experienced a breakup is always playing the victim, and not taking complete control even if the other partner was in the wrong. There is still something you can learn from every relationship. 
Continue to have faith in yourself, move forward and you will become a happier person after the breakup. Focus on the things that you love and you might be able to fix your previous relationship or move forward with a new and happier relationship. 

XOXO, 
Apollonia

Title: Dating A Woman In Her 30's: What You Need To Know!
Description:

Typically a woman in her 30s isn't going to want to waste her time and if you aren't someone that is showing up, being cordial, being straightforward then more often than not she will move on. These women are captivating to men because they don't lack ambition, or come off extremely confident. I hope you enjoy this video! I think I just may do another one and go into more depth about a woman in her 30's. ;)

Title: How To Find Love In A Big City!
Description:
Hello Everyone, 
I am so happy you are here! If you live in a big city like NYC, Miami, LA, Chicago, Boston, Dallas, the list can go on! Then this video is for you. In this video, I discuss how you can find love in a big city. I was drawn to make a video like this because I see, and read so many articles about love being hard to find in big cities when I don't believe this at all. 
Through the years of coaching, I have seen so many clients find love by changing their mindset about what the city has to offer. 
There are plenty of opportunities in big cities but you have to be aligned with your values. The thing I see often in big cities is people meeting often but they're so used to being fast-paced, either sleeping together initially or being a serial dater and not wanting to take things seriously. 
That's why it's so important for you to stay true to your values, don't give up, and make sure your mindset is focused on what you want and believe you will receive it! 
Please feel free to comment below if you have any questions or want to share any comments. I look forward to hearing from you. 

P.S- I have a blog all about this. It's pretty awesome! Check it out.

Title: 9 Powerful Things Women Need In A Relationship!
Description:
5 powerful things women need in a relationship. Wondering what women want or what women want in a relationship? I tell you that in this video. I share some relationship advice and dating advice on how to get a girl to like you. I know it's not always easy to understand what women want in a man but when you are dating these dating tips will help you better understand women. Women don't want the hottest guy! What women really want is a man that going to court them properly and show affection but in the right ways. Watch this video so you can learn what do women look for in a man. 

The 5 Powerful Things... 

Strength - Being there when she needs you to pick her up, or being the strength she needs to observe that things are not good for her. 

Positivity - No matter what comes your way always being positive in fixing a situation, overcoming obstacles, and keeping things fun will give the relationship spontaneity without feeling like the both of you dread serious conversations or interactions. 

Confidence- Standing true to who you are and what you believe. Not being dependent on her and only on yourself. Loving yourself fully to show up to be the best man possible for her. 

Stability/Security/Support- Showing up to constantly support each other in your goals. Having the confidence the woman needs from the man to show her that this is now a partnership. You are in it to win it together! 

Affection - This comes in all kinds of ways. In the video, I tell you about examples you can try. It's not all about touching and feeling. There is more to affection than just that! 

Please feel free to leave your comments here if you have any questions as well I would love to hear! 

XOXO

Title: Friendship Breakups: Advice On How To Handle It
Description:
Friendship breakups can be difficult I know! In this video, we talk about letting go of friendships and how to let go of a friendship. Sometimes as we grow we notice that there may be some unhealthy relationships in our lives and the friendships that we once had with our best friends are not toxic relationships. Toxic friendships can lead to bad relationships and the further you move along your personal development you learn how to be happy and how to have a self-love that your inspiration comes from within and you just don't know how to break up. That's why in this video I walk you through the right way to do this. The Law of attraction is so powerful in life when you are wondering how to find love and how to be confident. It's a lot about getting rid of the things that no longer serve you. 

 Sometimes the reason why we go through these moments is that they were lessons to understand what serves us and what does not. Now, let me be clear about one thing before we move on. Just because you choose to let go of a relationship/friendship does not mean that this person may be a horrible person it just can simply mean they are not aligned with you and your story, your growth, your support, and your development. One sacred thing I learned along the way was for me to find true love I had to preserve my energy I had to get clear on what relationship I wanted and that even meant all relationships that surrounded me. My Friendships! 
Let me go into the type of friendships we might find ourselves in. We have friendships in our life that may be our best friends, someone we can lean on and talk to about our idea beliefs, and typically they are our #1 motivators, then we find ourselves especially as single women and men in relationships that may be easy for us. Please comment below if you have any questions or need advice and I will answer your comments personally. 

XOXO,

Title: How To Forgive and Move Forward In a Relationship: 10 Tips To Move You Forward!
Description:
How to forgive and move forward in a relationship is about taking the steps towards forgiveness. In this video, I speak about letting go, how to forgive, what is forgiveness, and moving on. This video is for everything even if you are experiencing a breakup. My relationship advice and dating advice come from my own personal experiences and working with clients. Sometimes it's healthy to move on and I discuss how do I get over a guy and how do I get over an ex and how to heal after a breakup. 
I also talk about the step towards forgiveness and how to let go. In life, there are moments where things happen to us or they happen for us. It's a shift in perception which has a lot to do with forgiving and letting go. 
This is a choice that you make and it serves you more to forgive and detach than hold any anger towards someone or an issue that you faced in the past. When you don't forgive yourself for challenges you have faced then you ultimately create a wall that builds blockages from not letting love in. 
To be fully open to receiving love, it's important to be aligned with a purity of happiness so you can be looked at as an irresistible woman or man. Trust me when I tell you this, it has a lot to do with your energy! Please watch and leave your comments below. 

Sending you to love daily!

Title: Internet Dating Vs. Virtual Relationships: How Long Should I Wait Before Asking To Meet?
Description:
Hi Everyone,

I'm so happy you are here! In this video, I speak about how online dating and not meeting someone on the other side of the internet. Even though this may sound silly it happens often. You start chatting with a handsome or pretty woman and then as a week goes by they never set the intention to see each other, plan a date, or even blame it on traveling. Are you getting catfished, is this person in a relationship, is this person playing games, is this person too busy? I DON'T KNOW. What I do know is that your time is valuable and these relationships need to move forward. 
Virtual relationships and online dating are two different things. In this video, I discuss why internet dating is important but also when you should take it to the next level. When you are wondering how to meet a man or how to meet a woman it's hard to meet virtually. I share two common things that go wrong when it comes to online dating and meeting up. You should always set the intention right away. I never encourage you to get wrapped up in a virtual relationship that leads to no intention since this blocks you from meeting other people and also can be looked at as a sign of yearning for attention. When you ask yourself does online dating works, my answer is 100% just do it the right way to ultimately find love. 

xoxo,

Title: How To Love: Why People Are Addicted to The Wrong Idea of Love!
Description:
HOW TO LOVE, is a big topic in this modern world of dating. how to love yourself and how to love others are big contributors to how you see love right now. It takes time and commitment to look deeper into what is love. When you ask yourself how to have a healthy relationship it can stem from so many different things but also give you clearance on how you need to better yourself when it comes to love
I talk about how to love when you dating and trying to find a healthy relationship. 
I discuss where we go wrong in our 21century of dating and also talk about how important it is to not be ashamed of not knowing how to love, instead make the actions to learn how to love. 
Love starts with you first. If you want to have a beautiful relationship you must put yourself first and love yourself so fully that the idea of having a partner in your life is just an added perk. 

The key takeaway in this video to find the right love is to commit to these qualities. 

Time: Set aside time for someone who you are interested in. Things just don't happen. You have to put in the work to truly get to know someone. If you are ultimately looking for a partner put away all the distractions and give your attention to what is important. 

Devotion: Be persistent when dating and invent new ways to be seen. Commit yourself to your growth as well as your partner's growth. In relationships when you lose that "in love" feeling. This is when devotion plays a big part in your life. 

Commitment: Never lose sight of what your ultimate goal is for yourself. Be limitless, don't be scared, and remember you're enough. 

Honesty: This is the best policy! Don't lie be honest with everything and say it with confidence. It's about HOW YOU COMMUNICATE (YouTube Video In Bio) 
You can confidently communicate something and get your point across with positive and honest communication. If you choose to lie then you'll find yourself in relationship recovery a few months or years down the line.
